subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just the Facts?
author: Lisby
full_text:
Absolutely true. And I have been favorably impressed by the  
communications coming from the box in each of his taped sessions that  
I have heard.

Ann

> knew about it. We owe him that much!
>
>  Frank-S
